Package parkingRobot.hsamr1

Class PerceptionPMP

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkingRobot.hsamr1.PerceptionPMP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPerception
    public class PerceptionPMP
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPerception
    Implementation of IPerception-interface. ThePerception Module gets all the sensordata of the robot and provides it to the other modules with respective methods
    Author:
    PMP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void calibrateLineSensors()
      calibrate the two LineSensors use a black and white floor color
      double getBackSensorDistance()
      returns the Distance of the back Sensor to the next obstacle the Value commes from the third Tri-Sensor connected to the Arduino (the order of the Sensorports is set in the Arduino-code)
      double getBackSideSensorDistance()
      returns the Distance of the back-side Sensor to the next obstacle the Value commes from the fourth Tri-Sensor connected to the Arduino (the order of the Sensorports is set in the Arduino-code)
      IPerception.EncoderSensor getControlLeftEncoder()
      returns the IPerception.EncoderSensor Object of the left encoder for the Control-Module
      IPerception.OdoSensor getControlOdo()
      returns the Object of the IPerception.OdoSensor class for the Control Module
      IPerception.EncoderSensor getControlRightEncoder()
      returns the IPerception.EncoderSensor Object of the right encoder for the Control-Module
      double getFrontSensorDistance()
      returns the Distance of the front Sensor to the next obstacle the Value commes from the first Tri-Sensor connected to the Arduino (the order of the Sensorports is set in the Arduino-code)
      double getFrontSideSensorDistance()
      returns the Distance of the front-side Sensor to the next obstacle the Value commes from the second Tri-Sensor connected to the Arduino (the order of the Sensorports is set in the Arduino-code)
      int getLeftLineSensor()
      returns the groundcolortype of the left linesensor use IPerception.calibrateLineSensors() to calibrate the sensors for given environmental brightness
      int getLeftLineSensorValue()
      returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the left linesensor in percent (0% for calibrated black ground; 100% for calibrated white ground).
      IPerception.EncoderSensor getNavigationLeftEncoder()
      returns the IPerception.EncoderSensor Object of the left encoder for the Navigation-Module
      IPerception.OdoSensor getNavigationOdo()
      returns the Object of the IPerception.OdoSensor class for the Navigation Module
      IPerception.EncoderSensor getNavigationRightEncoder()
      returns the IPerception.EncoderSensor Object of the right encoder for the Navigation-Module
      int getOdometryT()
      returns the timedifference between the last 2 Odometrymeasurements in ms
      int getRightLineSensor()
      returns the groundcolortype of the right linesensor use IPerception.calibrateLineSensors() to calibrate the sensors for given environmental brightness
      int getRightLineSensorValue()
      returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the right linesensor in percent (0% for calibrated black ground; 100% for calibrated white ground).
      double getUOdmometryDiffernce()
      returns the latest measured shift in U-direction of the robot in mm.
      double getVOdometryDifference()
      returns the latest measured shift in V-direction of the robot in mm.
      void showSensorData()
      Displays all sensor data from the Arduino on the LCD-Display
      private void updateArduinoSensors()  
      private void updateLeftEncoderAngle()  
      private void updateLeftLightSensor()
      returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the left linesensor in raw values
      private void updateRightEncoderAngle()  
      private void updateRightLightSensor()
      returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the right linesensor in raw values
      void updateSensors()
      method for updating all the Sensorvalues by default automatically called by perceptionThread

    • Constructor Detail

      • PerceptionPMP

        public PerceptionPMP​(lejos.nxt.NXTMotor motorLeft,
                     lejos.nxt.NXTMotor motorRight,
                     IMonitor monitor)
        Creates a new PerceptionPMP module. Providing methods for getting all measuring data from the robot sensors.
        Parameters:
        motorLeft - reference to the left NXTMotor-Object
        motorRight - reference to the right NXTMotor-Object
        monitor - reference to main module Monitor class object

        public int getLeftLineSensor()
        Description copied from interface: IPerception
        returns the groundcolortype of the left linesensor use IPerception.calibrateLineSensors() to calibrate the sensors for given environmental brightness
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        groundtype (0-white ground, 1-grey ground, 2-black ground)

        public double getUOdmometryDiffernce()
        Description copied from interface: IPerception

        Specified by:

      • updateArduinoSensors

        private void updateArduinoSensors()

      • updateLeftLightSensor

        private void updateLeftLightSensor()
        returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the left linesensor in raw values. (0 to 1023) is used in IPerception.calibrateLineSensors() to calibrate the sensor for given environmental brightness

      • updateRightLightSensor

        private void updateRightLightSensor()
        returns the brightness of the subsurfacecolor under the right linesensor in raw values. (0 to 1023) is used in IPerception.calibrateLineSensors() to calibrate the sensor for given environmental brightness
